item.title: Disney names Josh D'Amaro as its new CEO
item.description: D'Amaro will take over next month from Bob Iger, who has led the company for nearly two decades.

item.title: Syria, once home to a large Jewish community, takes steps to return property to Jews
item.description: A Jewish heritage foundation has set out to help restore private property appropriated after Syrian Jews left the country.

item.title: NASA delays the launch of Artemis II lunar mission by at least a month

item.title: The U.K. investigates its ex-ambassador to the U.S. over alleged leaks to Epstein
item.description: The U.K. government says newly released files related to Jeffrey Epstein suggest that the former British ambassador to the U.S. may have shared market...

item.title: What we know about Savannah Guthrie's missing mother
